short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Meet in Connect4 extension for your browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Add this app to Google Chrome to enable you to more easily manage your Connect4 meetings inside your Google Calendar.

Set your meeting location to a Connect4 pod by toggling the Meet in Connect4 switch in your meeting invitation.

You can also view your upcoming Connect4 meetings at any time by clicking the extension icon.
